content: 5 6 6 6 7 8 8 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row bind off the remaining 28 30 34 34 36 36 38 sts for the back of the neck left front with smaller needles cast on 39 43 47 49 53 57 61 sts work 1x1 rib for 2 5 increasing 3 3 3 5 5 5 5 sts evenly across last row of ribbing 42 46 50 54 58 62 66 sts work as for back including all shaping and at the same time when piece measures 12 13 13½ 14 14 14 14 begin neck shaping decrease 1 st at neck edge every 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 row 15 16 18 18 17 17 18 times total continue even in pattern stitch until piece measures 21 21 22½ 23½ 24½ 25 25 from the beginning ending with a ws row shape shoulders bind off 5 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts at the beginning of the next row work 1 row even bind off 5 6 5 6 7 7 8 sts at the beginning of the next row work 1 row even bind off remaining 5 6 6 6 7 8 8 sts right front make same as left front reversing all shapings finishing sew up shoulder seams weave in all ends collar with smaller long circular needle and rs facing begin at lower right front edge pick up 52 56 56 58 58 58 58 sts to first neck decrease place neck marker pick up 41 41 41 43 45 49 53 sts along the neck edge pick up 29 31 35 35 37 37 39 sts along the back of the neck pick up 41 41 41 43 45 49 53 sts down along the neck edge to first neck decrease place neck marker pick up 52 52 56 58 58 58 58 sts to bottom of left front total = 215 225 229 237 243 251 261 sts beginning at lower left front edge work in 1x1 ribbing work in ribbing for 3 row buttonhole row on the next row work 5 buttonholes evenly along the sts between the neck marker and the bottom edge on either the right front for a woman or the left front for a man work these buttonholes by working yo k2tog for each buttonhole work 3 more row in ribbing bind off in ribbing armhole edging with smaller size needle pick up 85 85 85 91 91 101 101 sts around armhole edge work in 1 x 1 ribbing for 3/4 bind off loosely in ribbing repeat for other armhole sew up side seams sew on buttons to correspond to buttonholes ©2025 plymouth yarn company 062425jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side rev st st = reverse stockinette stitch= knit the ws row purl the rs row pm = place marker
